scripts.build-browser: vue-cli-service build && cd ./cordova && cordova run browser
scripts.build-android: vue-cli-service build && cd ./cordova && cordova run android --emulator
scripts.build-android-device: vue-cli-service build && cd ./cordova && cordova run android
scripts.build-ios: vue-cli-service build && cd ./cordova && cordova run ios --emulator
scripts.build-ios-device: vue-cli-service build && cd ./cordova && cordova run ios --device
